Title: Requires disclosure of the use of artificial intelligence in political communications
Summary: Requires disclosure of the use of artificial intelligence in political communications; directs the state board of elections to create criteria for determining whether a political communication contains an image or video footage created through generative artificial intelligence and to create a definition of content generated by artificial intelligence.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring disclosure of the use of artificial intelligence in political communications
